name: T Minus 3 Stops - Unfinished
description:
This is a Ludum Dare Extra 2022 game on the topic "Delaying the Inevitable". Made in spare time over 21 days as per Extra rules. It is about prolonging a chance meeting to catch up with a dear friend. Functional but unfinished and with temp art.

Created by: Anna Krasner

Resources used:

  • train audio loop from csengeri
  • train start and stop sounds from csengeri
  • train at station interior from theplax
  • Night ambience from MessyAcousticApocalypse666
  • phone buzz from richwise

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Ink narrative system
